page.title: 04LOCAL HISTORY - ELLENGLAZE
page.content:
In a sheltered vale on the edge of the sand dunes is{Ellenglaze Manor.} Of monastic origins,its old name was Hellenclose meaning 4 halls. This is derived from the story that successive storms completely buried the manor house under the sand-dunes together with the adjacent legendary city of Langarrow.
Not heeding tales of a curse, the Lord of the Manor proceeded to build a 4th house for his new bride. However, when an old witch was found hiding in one of the barns he ordered that she should be hanged. His young wife begged that the witch's life should be spared and as she kissed her,the old woman burst into tears which formed a stream between the house and the sandhills. The stream still flows.
